results.title: Looking for a New Way to See Iceland? Bring Your Knitting Needles.

results.title: R. Peter Munves, Master Marketer of Classical Music, Dies at 97
results.abstract: As an executive at Columbia and RCA Records, he popularized the classics for mass audiences by applying the same techniques used to sell pop music.
